full_text: Page 2852 MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET M-TIER DATE: 08/10/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 12:30- 1:00 AM 1:00-1:30 AM 1:30-2:00 AM 2:00-2:30 AM 2:30-3:00 AM 3:00-3:30 AM 3:30-4:00 AM 4:00-4:30 AM 4:30-5:00 AM 5:00 -5:30 AM 5:30-6:00 AM 6:00-6:30 AM 6:30-7:00 AM 7:00-7:30 AM 7:30-8:00 AM 8:00-8:30 AM 8:30- 9:00 AM 9:00-9:30 AM 9:30-10:00 AM 10:00-10:30 AM 10:30-11:00 AM 11:00-11:30 AM 11:30-12:00 AM 12:00-12:30 PM 12:30- 1:00 PM 1:00-1:30 PM 1:30-2:00 PM 2:00-2:30 PM 2:30-3:00 PM 3:00-3:30 PM 3:30-4:00 PM 4:00-4:30 PM 4:30-5:00 PM 5:00 -5:30 PM 5:30-6:00 PM 6:00-6:30 PM 6:30-7:00 PM 7:00-7:30 PM 7:30-8:00 PM 8:00-8:30 PM 8:30- 9:00 PM 9:00-9:30 PM 9:30-10:00 PM 10:00-10:30 PM 10:30-11:00 PM 11:00-11:30 PM 11:30-12:00 PM 804 831 904 939 1023 1043 1108 1151 1228 1231 102 145 215 232 317 333 806 832 905 941 1025 1047 1112 1152 1229 1233 104 147 216 237 318 334 b(6); b(7)(C) b(6); b(7)(C) 904 937 501 537 604 636 711 734 804 832 605 938 1003 1039 1113 1144 905 941 522 539 601 636 711 735 805 834 605 958 1003 1039 1113 1145 b(6); b(7)(C) b(6); b(7)(C) MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN DOJ-OGR-00026508

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET M-TIER DATE: 08/10/2019
TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE
MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document is a 30-minute check sheet for inmates in a special housing unit. It contains handwritten times and signatures, indicating that observations were made. The document is stamped with 'MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT' at the top.
